document.full_text: ugandan opposition leader kizza besigye was charged in court on monday with engaging in riotous behavior and inciting violence after he was arrested during protests over rising food and fuel prices.
document.title: ugandan opposition leader charged with incitement
lines_and_colors: ugandan opposition leader kizza besigye was charged in court on monday with engaging in riotous behavior and inciting violence after he was arrested during protests over rising food and fuel prices.
